dimension: 3 15/16 x 5 11/16 in. (10 x 14.45 cm) (image, trimmed to platemark)
title: St. Peter and St. Paul Seated in a Landscape
text: Saints Peter and Paul are represented on the exterior panels of Lucas's materpiece, the oil painting <I>The Last Judgement<I>, dating 1526-27, in the collection of the Stedelijk Museum de Lakenal at Leiden. The image of Saint Peter is identical to that in the panel painting
